weiDex 0.0.1 Documentation¶

What is weiDex?¶

WeiDex is a fully featured decentralized exchange. It guarantees the maximum standard of security, transparency and open source logic. The main idea behind decentralized exchanges is the removal of third party intermediaries. With their removal, decentralized exchanges don’t require any personal information such as names, addresses, and other private information.
